title: Rock Creek Park: Management
body: Explore This Park    Learn About the Park     Management             Management       Contact Information: Tara D. Morrison, Superintendent 3545 Williamsburg Lane NW Washington, D.C. 20008-1207 202-895-6000  Â    The documents here relate to the operation of the Park and various ongoing projects.  Record of Determination: Temporary Closure of Parts of the Rock Creek Park Golf Course NPS Planning, Environment and Public Comment site (PEPC)  Record of Determination: Temporary Closures in Rock Creek Park, Nuclear Security Summit March 30 - April 1, 2016 Rock Creek Park Multi-Use Trail FONSI Record of Determination: Temporary Road for Closures for Deer Management Action, December 2, 2014 Record of Determination of Closure, Fall 2014 Turf Renovation, Carter Barron Fields Record of Determination of Closure, Fall 2014 Turf Renovation, Civil War Defenses of Washington - Missouri Avenue Fields Record of Determination of Closure, Fall 2014 Turf Renovation, Meridian Hill Park Panels Record of Determination to Close Rock Creek Park to the Launching, Landing, or Operation of Unmanned Aircraft August 20, 2014 Record of Determination: Temporary Road Closures for Deer Management Action, January 3, 2014.
